pullrequest.title: Feature system part 4.5: use gz11 deps and update gtest

content.raw: Thanks for the link. I manually ran lcov removing all the test files and it brings up the coverage 86.6%.  I think there’s a separate issue that’s causing this and I’m pretty sure it’s related to gcc 8. I ran coverage on the default branch using gcc 7 and 8 and the results are 99.9% and 86.6% respectively.
content.html: Thanks for the link. I manually ran lcov removing all the test files and it brings up the coverage 86.6%. I think there’s a separate issue that’s causing this and I’m pretty sure it’s related to gcc 8. I ran coverage on the default branch using gcc 7 and 8 and the results are 99.9% and 86.6% respectively.
